backend/main.mo: Defines risk assessment logic, computing a risk score and level based on age, blood pressure, smoking, and symptoms, and exposes calculateRisk and helper query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for updating the LinkedIn link in the footer, mapping the feature to specific frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for documentation or reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app root and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root, landing, and assessment routes and provides the router to the app.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Renders the footer with branding, disclaimer, owner details, email link, and a conditionally rendered LinkedIn link based on configuration.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders a sticky header with logo and navigation buttons for home and the assessment page.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the overall page layout with watermark guard, header, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Disclaimer.tsx: Displays a styled medical disclaimer alert describing the tool's limitations.
frontend/src/components/WatermarkGuard.t: Development-only DOM scanner that logs warnings when banned watermark phrases appear in the UI.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Validates and exposes a LinkedIn URL from environment variables for conditional rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actorâ€™s calculateRisk method.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode overrides, and reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentPage.tsx: Implements the health assessment form with validation, state handling, and submission to the calculateRisk mutation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation to the assessment form.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and content paths for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, existing features, issues, and architectural notes for HeartSense AI.
